content: Electoral ward in SingaporeThis article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Clementi Constituency" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(November 2020)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Clementi Constituency** was a constituency in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). It used to exist from 1980 to 1988, where it merged into [Pasir Panjang Group Representation Constituency](/wiki/Pasir_Panjang_Group_Representation_Constituency) in 1988. It was carved out from [Bukit Timah constituency](/wiki/Bukit_Timah_Constituency) in 1980. ## Member of Parliament YearMember of ParliamentParty1980Bernard Chen Tian Lap[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)1984 ## Electoral results Note: The [Elections Department](/wiki/Elections_Department_Singapore) does not include rejected votes when calculating the vote shares of candidates. Hence, all candidates' vote shares will total to 100% at any given election (may not appear so in multi-way contests due to rounding). ### Elections in 1980s [General Election 1980](/wiki/1980_Singaporean_general_election): Clementi PartyCandidateVotes%±%[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)Bernard Chen Tian Lap12,16285.4United People's FrontMunjeet Singh2,07614.6[Majority](/wiki/Majority#Related_terms)10,08670.8[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)14,76597.6[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **win** (new seat)[General Election 1984](/wiki/1984_Singaporean_general_election): Clementi PartyCandidateVotes%±%[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)Bernard Chen Tian LapWalkover[Majority](/wiki/Majority#Related_terms)[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)20,890[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **hold**[Swing](/wiki/Swing_(politics)) This Singapore-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Clementi Constituency
